SELECT t1.orgCode as orgCode, t1.orgName as orgName, t1.orgTel as orgTel, t2.totalNum as totalNum from sys_orga t1 left join (SELECT tp3.orgId as orgId, count(tp1.id) as totalNum from alarm_info_temp tp1, alarm_def tp2, sys_device tp3 WHERE tp1.statusId = '1' and tp1.alarmDefId = tp2.alarmDefId and tp1.deviceId = tp3.deviceId and tp2.delFlag = '0' group by orgId ) t2 on t2.orgId = t1.id WHERE t1.delFlag = '0'
and t1.orgCode = '${orgCode}'
group by t1.id order by t1.orgCode

SELECT orgCode, orgName, case orgType when '2001' then '加气站' when '3001' then '气化站' end as orgType, orgAddr, orgTel FROM sys_orga WHERE delFlag = '0'
and orgName like '%${orgName}%'
order by orgCode
